title: Avengers: Endgame
overview: After the devastating events of Avengers: Infinity War, the universe is in ruins. With the help of remaining allies, the Avengers assemble once more to reverse Thanos' actions and restore balance to the universe.

title: Joker
overview: In Gotham City, mentally troubled comedian Arthur Fleck is disregarded and mistreated by society. He then embarks on a downward spiral of revolution and bloody crime.

title: Inception
overview: A skilled thief who steals corporate secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a CEO.

title: The Dark Knight
overview: Batman sets out to dismantle the remaining criminal organizations that plague Gotham. The arrival of the Joker throws the city into chaos and forces Batman closer to crossing the fine line between hero and vigilante.

title: Parasite
overview: Greed and class discrimination threaten the newly formed symbiotic relationship between the wealthy Park family and the destitute Kim clan.

title: Interstellar
overview: A team of explorers travels through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

title: The Shawshank Redemption
overview: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

title: Pulp Fiction
overview: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster's wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.

title: The Godfather
overview: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.

title: The Godfather Part II
overview: The continuation of the Corleone saga, this sequel explores the rise of young Vito Corleone and the struggles of Michael Corleone as he expands the family business.

title: Fight Club
overview: An insomniac office worker and a devil-may-care soapmaker form an underground fight club that evolves into something much more.

title: Forrest Gump
overview: The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson, Vietnam, Watergate, and other history unfold through the perspective of an Alabama man with an IQ of 75.

title: Gladiator
overview: A former Roman General sets out to exact vengeance against the corrupt emperor who murdered his family and sent him into slavery.

title: Titanic
overview: A seventeen-year-old aristocrat falls in love with a kind but poor artist aboard the luxurious, ill-fated R.M.S. Titanic.

title: The Matrix
overview: A computer hacker learns about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
overview: A meek Hobbit from the Shire and eight companions set out on a journey to destroy the powerful One Ring and save Middle-earth from the Dark Lord Sauron.

title: The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers
overview: Frodo and Sam continue their journey to Mordor to destroy the One Ring, while the divided Fellowship makes plans to defend Middle-earth from Sauron's forces.

title: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
overview: The final confrontation between the forces of good and evil fighting for control of Middle-earth. Frodo and Sam reach Mordor to destroy the One Ring.

title: Spirited Away
overview: During her family's move to the suburbs, a sullen 10-year-old girl wanders into a world ruled by gods, witches, and spirits, and where humans are changed into beasts.

title: Avengers: Infinity War
overview: The Avengers and their allies must be willing to sacrifice all in an attempt to defeat the powerful Thanos before his blitz of devastation and ruin puts an end to the universe.

title: The Lion King
overview: Lion prince Simba and his father are targeted by his bitter uncle, who wants to ascend the throne himself.

title: Terminator 2: Judgment Day
overview: A cyborg, identical to the one who failed to kill Sarah Connor, must now protect her teenage son from a more advanced and powerful cyborg.

title: Star Wars: Episode V - The Empire Strikes Back
overview: After the Rebels are overpowered by the Empire on the ice planet Hoth, Luke Skywalker begins Jedi training with Yoda while his friends are pursued by Darth Vader.

title: Star Wars: Episode IV - A New Hope
overview: Luke Skywalker joins forces with a Jedi Knight, a cocky pilot, a Wookiee, and two droids to save the galaxy and rescue Princess Leia from the Empire’s world-destroying battle station.

title: Jurassic Park
overview: During a preview tour, a theme park suffers a major power breakdown that allows its cloned dinosaur exhibits to run amok.

title: The Silence of the Lambs
overview: A young FBI cadet must confide in an incarcerated and manipulative killer to receive his help on catching another serial killer.

title: Saving Private Ryan
overview: Following the Normandy Landings, a group of U.S. soldiers go behind enemy lines to retrieve a paratrooper whose brothers have been killed in action.

title: Schindler's List
overview: In German-occupied Poland during World War II, Oskar Schindler becomes concerned for his Jewish workforce after witnessing their persecution by the Nazis.

title: The Prestige
overview: Two stage magicians engage in competitive rivalry that leads them on a life-long battle to create the ultimate illusion while sacrificing everything they have to outwit each other.

title: Whiplash
overview: A promising young drummer enrolls at a cutthroat music conservatory where his dreams of greatness are mentored by an abusive instructor.

title: Mad Max: Fury Road
overview: In a post-apocalyptic wasteland, Max teams up with Furiosa to flee from a cult leader and his army in a high-octane road war.

title: The Departed
overview: An undercover cop and a mole in the police try to identify each other while infiltrating an Irish gang in Boston.

title: Alien
overview: After a space merchant vessel receives an unknown transmission, one of the crew is attacked by a mysterious lifeform.

title: Back to the Future
overview: Marty McFly, a teenager, is accidentally sent back in time in a DeLorean and must ensure his parents fall in love.

title: Goodfellas
overview: The story of Henry Hill and his life in the mob, covering his relationship with wife Karen and his mafia partners.

title: The Green Mile
overview: The lives of guards on Death Row are affected by one of their charges: a black man accused of child murder and rape, yet who has a mysterious gift.

title: A Beautiful Mind
overview: After John Nash, a brilliant but asocial mathematician, accepts secret work in cryptography, his life takes a turn for the nightmarish.

title: Django Unchained
overview: With the help of a German bounty hunter, a freed slave sets out to rescue his wife from a brutal Mississippi plantation owner.

title: The Wolf of Wall Street
overview: Based on the true story of Jordan Belfort, from his rise to a wealthy stock-broker to his fall involving crime, corruption and the federal government.

title: La La Land
overview: While navigating their careers in Los Angeles, a pianist and an actress fall in love while attempting to reconcile their aspirations.

title: Blade Runner 2049
overview: A young blade runner discovers a long-buried secret that has the potential to plunge society into chaos.

title: Avengers: Age of Ultron
overview: The Avengers reassemble to face Ultron, a technological enemy bent on human extinction.

title: Guardians of the Galaxy
overview: A group of intergalactic criminals must pull together to stop a fanatical warrior with plans to purge the universe.

title: Logan
overview: An aging Wolverine and a frail Professor X try to find refuge—but get pulled into a final mission protecting a young mutant girl.

title: Black Panther
overview: T’Challa returns home as king of Wakanda but finds his sovereignty challenged by a powerful adversary.

title: Toy Story
overview: A cowboy doll is profoundly threatened and jealous when a new spaceman action figure supplants him as top toy in a boy’s room.

title: Toy Story 3
overview: As Andy prepares to depart for college, the toys find themselves mistakenly delivered to a day‑care center and must find their way home.

title: Coco
overview: Aspiring musician Miguel travels to the Land of the Dead to unlock his family's history and confront his ban on music.

title: Finding Nemo
overview: After his son is captured in the Great Barrier Reef and taken to Sydney, a timid clownfish sets out on a journey to bring him home.

title: Up
overview: An elderly widower and an earnest young Wilderness Explorer fly to South America in a house lifted by balloons.

title: Inside Out
overview: After young Riley is uprooted from her Midwest life and moved to San Francisco, her emotions – Joy, Fear, Anger, Disgust, and Sadness – conflict on how best to navigate a new city, house, and school.

title: The Incredibles
overview: A family of undercover superheroes, while trying to live the quiet suburban life, are forced into action to save the world.

title: Deadpool
overview: A fast-talking mercenary with a morbid sense of humor is subjected to a rogue experiment that leaves him with accelerated healing powers and a quest for revenge.

title: Deadpool 2
overview: Foul-mouthed mutant mercenary Wade Wilson (a.k.a. Deadpool), brings together a team of fellow mutant rogues to protect a young boy with supernatural abilities from the brutal, time-traveling cyborg, Cable.

title: Wonder Woman
overview: When an American pilot crashes on the shores of her sheltered island paradise and tells tales of a massive conflict raging in the outside world, Diana leaves her home to stop the threat and becomes Wonder Woman.

title: Princess Mononoke
overview: On a journey to find the cure for a Tatarigami's curse, Ashitaka finds himself in the middle of a war between the forest gods and Tatara, a mining colony.

title: Your Name
overview: Two teenagers share a profound, magical connection upon discovering they are swapping bodies. Things manage to become even more complicated when the boy and girl decide to meet in person.

title: Spiderman: Into the Spider-Verse
overview: Teen Miles Morales becomes Spider-Man of his universe, and must join with five spider-powered individuals from other dimensions to stop a threat for all realities.

title: The Revenant
overview: A frontiersman on a fur trading expedition in the 1820s fights for survival after being mauled by a bear and left for dead by members of his own hunting team.

title: Gravity
overview: Two astronauts work together to survive after an accident leaves them stranded in space.

title: Mad Max: Fury Road
overview: In a post-apocalyptic wasteland, Max teams up with a mysterious woman, Furiosa, to flee from a tyrant and his army in a high-speed road war.

title: Toy Story 4
overview: When Bonnie adds a reluctant new toy called 'Forky' to her room, a road trip alongside old and new friends reveals how big the world can be for a toy.

title: Parasite
overview: A poor family schemes to become employed by a wealthy family by infiltrating their household and posing as unrelated, highly qualified individuals.

title: Frozen II
overview: Elsa, Anna, Kristoff, Olaf and Sven leave Arendelle to travel to an ancient forest to discover the origin of Elsa's magical powers and save their kingdom.

title: Knives Out
overview: A detective investigates the death of a patriarch of an eccentric, combative family.

title: The Lion King
overview: After the murder of his father, a young lion prince flees his kingdom only to learn the true meaning of responsibility and bravery.
Two British soldiers must deliver a message deep in enemy territory that will stop 1,600 men, including one of the soldier's brothers, from walking into a deadly trap.

title: Ford v Ferrari
overview: American car designer Carroll Shelby and driver Ken Miles battle corporate interference and the laws of physics to build a revolutionary race car for Ford.

title: Once Upon a Time in Hollywood
overview: A faded television actor and his stunt double strive to achieve fame and success in the final years of Hollywood's Golden Age in 1969 Los Angeles.

title: Dangal
overview: Former wrestler Mahavir Singh Phogat trains his daughters Geeta and Babita to become world-class wrestlers, breaking societal norms in the process.

title: Jawan
overview: A man driven by a personal vendetta rises to take down corrupt systems while dealing with his own past.

title: Pathaan
overview: An Indian spy battles terrorism in a race against time while reconnecting with his past.

title: Animal
overview: A complex father-son relationship evolves amidst violence, power, and emotional trauma.

title: Bajrangi Bhaijaan
overview: An Indian man with a magnanimous heart takes a young mute Pakistani girl back to her homeland to reunite her with her family.

title: Secret Superstar
overview: A teenage girl dreams of becoming a singer but must overcome her conservative family's objections.

title: PK
overview: An alien on Earth loses the only device he can use to communicate with his spaceship. His innocent nature and child-like questions force people to evaluate the impact of religion on their lives.

title: Sanju
overview: A biopic of controversial actor Sanjay Dutt, covering his film career, jail time, and personal struggles.

title: Padmaavat
overview: Rani Padmavati is the wife of Maharawal Ratan Singh and pride of the Rajput kingdom. The legend of her beauty reaches Alauddin Khilji who becomes obsessed with her.

title: War
overview: An Indian soldier is assigned to eliminate his former mentor who has gone rogue.

title: Chennai Express
overview: A man travels to a small town in South India to immerse his late grandfather's ashes but gets caught up in a series of adventures with a mysterious woman.

title: 3 Idiots
overview: Three engineering students navigate their friendship, college pressures, and expectations to find their true calling.

title: Simmba
overview: A corrupt cop becomes an unlikely hero after a tragedy changes his perspective on justice.

title: Bhool Bhulaiyaa 2
overview: A young man gets trapped in a haunted haveli while searching for his roots and uncovers unexpected secrets.

title: Drishyam 2
overview: A man continues to protect his family from a crime that threatens to unravel their lives, years after the first incident.

title: Uri: The Surgical Strike
overview: An Indian army officer leads a covert operation to avenge the attack on their base in Uri.

awards.name: National Film Awards
awards.category: Best Feature Film on National Integration

title: Tanhaji: The Unsung Warrior
overview: The story of Maratha warrior Tanhaji Malusare and his fight against the Mughal Empire to reclaim a strategic fort.

awards.name: National Film Awards
awards.category: Best Popular Film Providing Wholesome Entertainment

title: Kabir Singh
overview: An impulsive surgeon spirals into self-destruction after his girlfriend is forced to marry someone else.

title: Adipurush
overview: An epic retelling of the Hindu epic Ramayana, depicting Lord Ram's battle against the demon king Ravana.

title: Brahmastra: Part One – Shiva
overview: A young man discovers his mystical powers and embarks on a journey to save the world from dark forces.

title: Stree 2
overview: The sequel to the hit horror-comedy Stree, where a small town is haunted by a mysterious spirit, blending scares with laughs.

title: Chhaava
overview: An action-packed drama centered around a soldier’s journey and the sacrifices made to protect the nation.

title: Gadar 2
overview: The sequel to the blockbuster Gadar, depicting a gripping story of love and patriotism during turbulent times in India’s history.

title: Kesari Chapter 2: The Untold Story of Jallianwala Bagh
overview: A historical drama depicting the brutal massacre at Jallianwala Bagh and the struggle for Indian independence.

title: Soorma
overview: Based on the true story of hockey player Sandeep Singh, who makes an inspiring comeback after a severe injury.

title: Piku
overview: A quirky and heartwarming tale of a father-daughter relationship that explores life's ups and downs.

title: Barfi!
overview: A romantic comedy-drama about the adventures and relationships of a deaf and mute young man in India.

awards.name: National Film Awards
awards.category: Best Popular Film Providing Wholesome Entertainment

title: Lagaan
overview: Villagers in colonial India challenge their British rulers to a cricket match to avoid paying oppressive taxes.

awards.name: National Film Awards
awards.category: Best Popular Film Providing Wholesome Entertainment

title: Mother India
overview: A powerful drama about a poverty-stricken woman who struggles to raise her sons and keep her family together.

title: Sholay
overview: A classic action-adventure film about two ex-convicts hired to capture a ruthless bandit terrorizing a village.
